author: namit
msg: HIVE-1030 Hive should use scratchDir instead of system temporary directory

author: hwright
msg: In a bold experimental move, replace the static html with an Anakia-generated
website, in the same pattern as the incubator website itself, and as
I invite folks to read the README and then play around with it.  If we decide
we hate this type of thing, we'll just revert back to the previous version of
the site (though I recommend we still keep the actual contents in publish/)
